mapper.select: SELECT protocol_product_id, protocol_id, product_id, product_desc FROM protocol_product where airport_code = #{airportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and protocol_product_id = #{protocolProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

SELECT protocol_product_id, protocol_id, product_id, product_desc FROM protocol_product where airport_code = #{airportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and protocol_id = #{protocolId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0
update protocol_product set is_deleted = 1 where protocol_product_id not in (${ids00}) and airport_code = #{airportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and protocol_id = #{protocolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update protocol_product
product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
where airport_code = #{airportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and protocol_product_id = #{protocolProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
